sentences.en: Both musically and lyrically it is very effective.
sentences.cn: 这首歌的音乐和歌词都给人留下非常深刻的印象。

sentences.en: He lyrically described the countryside around his home.
sentences.cn: 他以抒情的笔调描绘了住宅周围的乡村景致。

sentences.en: I'm trying to show children that it's lyrically beautiful out there, wherever you live.
sentences.cn: 我想让孩子们知道，在那里无论住在哪里都有诗情画意的美景。

sentences.en: Or let Fed chief Ben Bernanke wax lyrically about green shoots.
sentences.cn: 要不就让本、伯南克对所谓的“新芽”粉饰一番.

sentences.en: She danced the part of the black swan very lyrically.
sentences.cn: 她充满感情地跳了一段布莱克的《天鹅湖》.

words.tran_cn: 抒情诗调的；感情丰富的；充满愉悦的
抒情性；抒情诗体；抒情方式抒情
抒情诗人；（流行歌曲等的）歌词作者
弹七弦琴的人；抒情诗人
